name: Chikorita
flavorText:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

next.name: Bayleef
next.flavorText:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.

pokemon.name: Meganium
pokemon.flavorText:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.
